Event.Message: RundownStart
RundownComplete
RundownVolumeInformation VolumeId: %1, DeviceName: %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Vcb" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="DeviceNameLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="DeviceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="DeviceNameLength"/> </template>

Event.Message:
The NTFS volume has been successfully mounted.
Volume GUID: %4 Volume Name: %6 Volume Label: %8 Device Name: %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Vcb" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="DeviceNameLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="DeviceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="DeviceNameLength"/> <data name="VolumeGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="VolumeNameLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="VolumeName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="VolumeNameLength"/> <data name="VolumeLabelLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="VolumeLabel" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="VolumeLabelLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: Volume %1 (%2) %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DriveName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DeviceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="CorruptionActionState" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: NTFS global corruption action state is now %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="hc_stateid" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: The file system structure that maintains security information on volume %1 (%2) has grown excessively large and fragmented. The structure has reached %3%% of its maximum fragmentation limit. If the structure continues to grow and reaches this limit, it may not be possible to create new files on this volume. It is strongly recommended that the volume be taken offline for preventative maintenance.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DriveName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DeviceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="FragmentationLevel" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> </template>

Event.Message: The system failed to flush data to the transaction log. Corruption may occur in VolumeId: %1, DeviceName: %2. (%3)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VolumeId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DeviceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> </template>

Event.Message:
An operation failed because the disk was full.
Process: %5 Free space in bytes: %7 Page file size in bytes: 0 Volume guid: %1 Volume name: %3 Is boot volume: %6
Your disk '%3' is full. Use disk cleanup to free up disk space by deleting unnecessary files. If this is a thinly provisioned volume the physical storage backing this volume may have been exhausted.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VolumeGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="VolumeNameLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="VolumeName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="VolumeNameLength"/> <data name="ProcessNameLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ProcessName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="ProcessNameLength"/> <data name="IsBootVolume" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="FreeSpaceInBytes" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> </template>

Event.Message:
Summary of disk space usage, since last event:
Lowest free space in bytes: %4 Highest free space in bytes: %5 Page file size in bytes: 0 Volume guid: %1 Volume name: %3 Is boot volume: %6
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VolumeGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="VolumeNameLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="VolumeName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="VolumeNameLength"/> <data name="LowestFreeSpaceInBytes" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="HighestFreeSpaceInBytes" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="IsBootVolume" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> </template>

Event.Message:
Surprise removal of a persistent memory device with active DAX mappings. This might lead to data corruption.
Volume GUID: %4 Volume Name: %6 Volume Label: %8
Guidance: A reboot is required to clean up the DAX mappings.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Vcb" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="DeviceNameLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="DeviceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="DeviceNameLength"/> <data name="VolumeGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="VolumeNameLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="VolumeName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="VolumeNameLength"/> <data name="VolumeLabelLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="VolumeLabel" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="VolumeLabelLength"/> </template>

Event.Message:
A volume that already has DAX mappings is being mounted. This generally occurs after surprise removal. This might lead to data corruption.
Volume GUID: %4 Volume Name: %6
Guidance: A reboot is required to clean up the DAX mappings.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Vcb" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="DeviceNameLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="DeviceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="DeviceNameLength"/> <data name="VolumeGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="VolumeNameLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="VolumeName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="VolumeNameLength"/> </template>

Event.Message:
IO latency summary common data for volume:
Volume Id: %1 Volume name: %3 Is boot volume: %4
Max Acceptable IO Latency: %5 ms Read/Write latency buckets (ns): [%6, %7, %8, %9, %10, %11, %12] Trim latency buckets (ns): [%13, %14, %15, %16, %17, %18, %19] Flush latency buckets (ns): [%20, %21, %22, %23, %24, %25, %26]
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VolumeCorrelationId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="VolumeNameLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="VolumeName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="VolumeNameLength"/> <data name="IsBootVolume" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="MaxLatencyMs" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="ReadWriteLatencyBucket1" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="ReadWriteLatencyBucket2" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="ReadWriteLatencyBucket3" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="ReadWriteLatencyBucket4" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="ReadWriteLatencyBucket5" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="ReadWriteLatencyBucket6" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="ReadWriteLatencyBucket7" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="TrimLatencyBucket1" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="TrimLatencyBucket2" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="TrimLatencyBucket3" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="TrimLatencyBucket4" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="TrimLatencyBucket5" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="TrimLatencyBucket6" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="TrimLatencyBucket7" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="FlushLatencyBucket1" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="FlushLatencyBucket2" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="FlushLatencyBucket3" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="FlushLatencyBucket4" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="FlushLatencyBucket5" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="FlushLatencyBucket6" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="FlushLatencyBucket7" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> </template>

Event.Message:
IO latency summary:
Volume Id: %1 Volume name: %3 Is boot volume: %4
Interval duration: %6 us
Non-cached reads: IO count: %7 Total bytes: %8 Avg latency: %9 ns
Non-cached writes: IO count: %10 Total bytes: %11 Avg latency: %12 ns
File flushes: IO count: %13 Avg latency: %14 ns
Volume flushes: IO count: %15 Avg latency: %16 ns
File level trims: IO count: %17 Total bytes: %18 Extents count: %19 Avg latency: %20 ns
Volume trims: IO count: %21 Total bytes: %22 Extents count: %23 Avg latency: %24 ns
For more details see the details tab.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VolumeCorrelationId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="VolumeNameLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="VolumeName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="VolumeNameLength"/> <data name="IsBootVolume" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="HighIoLatencyCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="IntervalDurationUs" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="NCReadIOCount" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="NCReadTotalBytes" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="NCReadAvgLatencyNs" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="NCWriteIOCount" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="NCWriteTotalBytes" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="NCWriteAvgLatencyNs" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="FileFlushCount" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="FileFlushAvgLatencyNs" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="VolumeFlushCount" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="VolumeFlushAvgLatencyNs" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="FileLevelTrimCount" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="FileLevelTrimTotalBytes" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="FileLevelTrimExtentsCount" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="FileLevelTrimAvgLatencyNs" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="VolumeTrimCount" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="VolumeTrimTotalBytes" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="VolumeTrimExtentsCount" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="VolumeTrimAvgLatencyNs" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="IoBucketsCount" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> <data name="TotalBytesBucketsCount" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> <data name="ExtentsBucketsCount" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> <data name="IoCount" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong" count="IoBucketsCount"/> <data name="TotalLatencyUs" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong" count="IoBucketsCount"/> <data name="TotalBytes" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong" count="TotalBytesBucketsCount"/> <data name="TrimExtentsCount" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong" count="ExtentsBucketsCount"/> <data name="IoTypeIndex" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort" count="IoBucketsCount"/> </template>

Event.Message:
An IO took more than %5 ms to complete:
Process Id: %6 Process name: %7 File name: %9 File offset: %12 IO Type: %10 IO Size: %11 bytes %15 cluster(s) starting at cluster %14 Latency: %13 ms
Volume Id: %1 Volume name: %3 Is boot volume: %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VolumeCorrelationId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="VolumeNameLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="VolumeName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="VolumeNameLength"/> <data name="IsBootVolume" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="MaxLatencyMs" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="ProcessId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ProcessName" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="FileNameLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="FileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="FileNameLength"/> <data name="IoType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="IoSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="FileOffset" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="LatencyMs" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="StartingLcn" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="ClustersCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="TableIndex" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> </template>

Event.Message:
A %9 failed with %14. This may indicate a failing disk.
Process Id: %5 Process name: %6 File name: %8 IO Size: %10 bytes File offset: %11 %13 cluster(s) starting at cluster %12
Volume Id: %1 Volume name: %3 Is boot volume: %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VolumeCorrelationId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="VolumeNameLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="VolumeName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="VolumeNameLength"/> <data name="IsBootVolume" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="ProcessId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ProcessName" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="FileNameLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="FileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="FileNameLength"/> <data name="IoType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="IoSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="FileOffset" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="StartingLcn" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="ClustersCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="FailureStatus" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> <data name="TableIndex" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> </template>

Event.Message:
In the past %5 seconds we had IO failures. This may indicate a failing disk.
High latency IO count: %6 Failed writes: %7 Failed reads: %8 Bad clusters relocated: %9
Volume Id: %1 Volume name: %3 Is boot volume: %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VolumeCorrelationId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="VolumeNameLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="VolumeName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="VolumeNameLength"/> <data name="IsBootVolume" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="SecondsElapsed" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HighLatencyCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="FailedWriteCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="FailedReadCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="BadClusterHotfixCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ValuesCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HighLatencyArray" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt" count="ValuesCount"/> <data name="FailedWriteArray" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt" count="ValuesCount"/> <data name="FailedReadArray" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt" count="ValuesCount"/> <data name="BadClusterHotfixArray" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt" count="ValuesCount"/> <data name="StatusArray" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:NTStatus" count="ValuesCount"/> <data name="TableIndexArray" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt" count="ValuesCount"/> </template>

Event.Message:
An IO failed with %12 and NTFS has relocated the clusters. The original clusters are now marked as bad and they will not be reused. This may indicate a failing disk.
Process Id: %5 Process name: %6 File name: %8 File offset: %9 %11 cluster(s) were marked as bad starting at cluster %10
Volume guid: %1 Volume name: %3 Is boot volume: %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VolumeGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="VolumeNameLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="VolumeName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="VolumeNameLength"/> <data name="IsBootVolume" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="ProcessId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ProcessName" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="FileNameLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="FileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="FileNameLength"/> <data name="BadFileOffset" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="BadLcn" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="ClustersCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="FailureStatus" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> <data name="TableIndex" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> </template>

Event.Message: NtfsLogFileFull VolumeId: %1, Reason: %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Vcb" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="LogFileFullReason" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> </template>

Event.Message: PeriodicCheckpointStart VolumeId: %1, Reason: %2, Usage: %3%
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Vcb" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="LogFileFullReason" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="LogFileUsePercentage" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> </template>

Event.Message: PeriodicCheckpointComplete VolumeId: %1, DirtyMetaDataPages: %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Vcb" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="DirtyMetaDataPages" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: CleanCheckpointStart VolumeId: %1, Reason: %2, Usage: %3%
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Vcb" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="LogFileFullReason" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="LogFileUsePercentage" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> </template>

Event.Message: CleanCheckpointComplete VolumeId: %1, DirtyMetaDataPages: %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Vcb" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="DirtyMetaDataPages" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: MftRecordRead VolumeId: %1, BaseFileId: %2, FileId: %3, CacheHit: %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Vcb" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="BaseFileId" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="FileId" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="CacheHit" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> </template>

Event.Message: MftRecordRead VolumeId: %1, BaseFileId: %2, FileId: %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Vcb" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="BaseFileId" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="FileId" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Thinly provisioned volume %1 (%2) were not being mapped between clusters %3 and %4. It is now fixed.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VolumeId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DeviceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Starting LCN" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Ending LCN" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> </template>

Event.Message: Thinly provisioned volume %1 (%2) were not being mapped between clusters %3 and %4. Repair was unsucccessful. Possibly out of available slabs.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VolumeId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DeviceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Starting LCN" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Ending LCN" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> </template>

Event.Message: WorkItem queued, WorkItem: %1, Reason: %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="WorkItem" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Reason" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: WorkItem queue failed, WorkItem: %1, Reason: %2, Error: %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="WorkItem" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Reason" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> </template>

Event.Message: WorkItem started, WorkItem: %1, Reason: %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="WorkItem" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Reason" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: WorkItem completed, WorkItem: %1, Reason: %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="WorkItem" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Reason" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message:
File metadata optimization started.
Volume guid: %1 Volume name: %3 File reference: %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VolumeGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="VolumeNameLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="VolumeName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="VolumeNameLength"/> <data name="FileReference" inType="win:UInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> </template>

Event.Message:
File metadata optimization completed.
Volume guid: %1 Volume name: %3 File reference: %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VolumeGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="VolumeNameLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="VolumeName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="VolumeNameLength"/> <data name="FileReference" inType="win:UInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> </template>

Event.Message:
NTFS volume dismount has started.
Volume GUID: %4 Volume Name: %6 Volume Label: %8
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Vcb" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="DeviceNameLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="DeviceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="DeviceNameLength"/> <data name="VolumeGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="VolumeNameLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="VolumeName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="VolumeNameLength"/> <data name="VolumeLabelLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="VolumeLabel" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="VolumeLabelLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: NTFS has sent volume dismount event notification and is waiting for the notifications to complete.
The volume dismount event notification on the NTFS volume has completed.

The NTFS volume has successfully dismounted.
Volume GUID: %4 Volume Name: %6 Volume Label: %8
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Vcb" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="DeviceNameLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="DeviceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="DeviceNameLength"/> <data name="VolumeGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="VolumeNameLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="VolumeName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="VolumeNameLength"/> <data name="VolumeLabelLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="VolumeLabel" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="VolumeLabelLength"/> </template>

Event.Message:
The NTFS volume dismount failed.
Error:%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Status" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> </template>

Event.Message:
NTFS failed to mount the volume.
Error: %1 Volume GUID: %2 Volume Name: %4
Guidance: The volume is recognized by NTFS but it is corrupted that NTFS could not mount it. Run CHKDSK /F to fix any errors on this volume, and then try accessing it.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> <data name="VolumeGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="VolumeNameLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="VolumeName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="VolumeNameLength"/> </template>

Event.Message:
Efs offloading initiated.
Volume serial: %1 File reference: %2 File name: %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VolumeSerialNumber" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="FileReference" inType="win:UInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="FileNameLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="FileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="FileNameLength"/> </template>

Event.Message:
Efs offloading read regular file.
Volume serial: %1 File reference: %2 File name: %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VolumeSerialNumber" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="FileReference" inType="win:UInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="FileNameLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="FileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="FileNameLength"/> </template>

Event.Message:
Efs offloading write regular file.
Volume serial: %1 File reference: %2 File name: %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VolumeSerialNumber" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="FileReference" inType="win:UInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="FileNameLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="FileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="FileNameLength"/> </template>

Event.Message:
Efs legacy initiated.
Volume serial: %1 File reference: %2 File name: %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VolumeSerialNumber" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="FileReference" inType="win:UInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="FileNameLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="FileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="FileNameLength"/> </template>

Event.Message:
Efs legacy read regular file.
Volume serial: %1 File reference: %2 File name: %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VolumeSerialNumber" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="FileReference" inType="win:UInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="FileNameLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="FileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="FileNameLength"/> </template>

Event.Message:
Efs legacy write regular file.
Volume serial: %1 File reference: %2 File name: %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VolumeSerialNumber" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="FileReference" inType="win:UInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="FileNameLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="FileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="FileNameLength"/> </template>
